sentences.sContent: One ounce of almonds contains nearly half the recommended daily amount.
sentences.sContent_eng: One ounce of almonds contains nearly half the recommended daily amount.
sentences.sCn: 一盎司杏仁大约包含每日需求量的一半。

sentences.sContent: I knew every ounce would weigh on me like a little anchor, so I was determined not to include a single item that was unnecessary or superfluous.
sentences.sContent_eng: I knew every ounce would weigh on me like a little anchor, so I was determined not to include a single item that was unnecessary or superfluous.
sentences.sCn: 我意识到每盎司的重量都会成为一个小小的船锚压迫着我，所以我决定不带任何一样不必要的或多余的东西。

trans.tranOther: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 28.35 grams. There are 16 ounces in a pound.
